I haven't worn foundation in decades. The closest I've gotten has been tinted moisturizer from Walmart.

So, I purchased 4 foundations and saved up all of my freebies to color test at home.

Armani's luminous silk not only matched well, but it also has an appropriate amount of coverage.

I've been using Clinique's Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+‚Ñ¢ for some time now, and overall, it's a great everyday moisturizer, especially for those with normal to dry skin. It has a lightweight, silky texture that absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy or heavy residue. My skin feels soft, smooth, and nourished after application, and I appreciate that it layers well under makeup without pilling.

One of the standout aspects of this moisturizer is its barrier-repairing properties. With continued use, I‚Äôve noticed my skin feeling more resilient and balanced, which is a huge plus, especially in harsher weather conditions. I also love that it‚Äôs fragrance-free and suitable for sensitive skin‚Äîno irritation or breakouts, which is sometimes a concern with richer creams.

That being said, while it does a good job of maintaining hydration throughout the day, I find that it‚Äôs not quite rich enough for extremely dry skin, especially in the winter months. If my skin is feeling extra parched, I usually have to layer it with a more intensive moisturizer or a hydrating serum to get the level of moisture I need.

Overall, this is a reliable, dermatologist-developed moisturizer that delivers consistent results. It‚Äôs a great staple for daily skincare routines, but if you're looking for deep, long-lasting hydration, you may need something a bit richer. Still, it's a solid choice for keeping the skin balanced and healthy!

product_name: Drunk Elephant Lala Retro Whipped Moisturizer
merged_reviews:
I love how portable this mini is, it‚Äôs great for travel and a little goes a long way when I mix it with the B-hydra serum in the PM. It‚Äôs helped soothe my skin and feels so lightweight and not heavy at all. This may be better for a younger person and used in the summer.  It just felt like my skin was dry going on but then felt greasy all day.  I know it is contradicting, but that's exactly how it was for me.  So I probably won't try it again - even in the summer. Do NOT buy the refill! The moisturizer is great, but the refills no longer fit into the standard size product. I used to have no problem, but something has changed. I have purchased 2 new standard size containers and the refills do NOT work. Great overall product but I‚Äôve spent too much extra $$$ trying to make the refills work. I used this product consistently until empty and could not see or feel a difference in my skin. I've had oily skin my entire life and haven't needed much in the name of moisturizer. I'm used to getting away with a light liquid (Dr Jart's is my holy grail).. but as I'm approaching 40, winters do dry me out, I'm noticing a change, and wrinkles starting to creep in. I've sampled the whole gamut of moisturizers thanks to Sephora, trying to find one that doesn't break me out.. hyaluronic acid causes me acne and it's in everything these days. I recently tried this one and it's serum cousin as samples - the serum breaks me out, but not this. This one is it. So I took the plunge and have been using it regularly for a week now, and no breakouts, even with gym workouts/sweat in the mix. It's definitely improved my skin quality and I like the dispensing mechanism, as I find jars unhygienic. Also happy they have the refill option to reduce plastic waste as well. The pump took a few uses to work well but in general very good product This product has let me down. 

The moisturizer itself is doing a good job on my skin, but the pump on the unit has failed. I‚Äôve been using it for less than a week and the pump has stopped working. I‚Äôve tried to shake it and bump it around in order to ensure that the product can reach the pump from inside, but it‚Äôs not working.

I‚Äôve had to open the container to access the moisturizer which means it‚Äôs no longer kept sterile. This is very disappointing given the purchase price. DO NOT BUY REFILL! Love the moisturizer but hate the refill. Caused me to lose so much product when twisting the pump back in place. i received a travel sized moisturizer in a Sephora kit and really enjoyed it. the moisturizer isn't too thick and a small amount goes a long way. i feel like too much of the product especially around the lips and nose feels as if you're sweating so you really only need a pea sized amount for the whole face. it wasn't oily and dries down nice, however my only complaint is the smell. it smells almost like a stale hospital to me. other than the smell i really do enjoy this moisturizer and would purchase a full sized version. Was using it for a few years and then the new formulation gave me a red rash all over my face and was stinging. I think this was recalled a few times. It smells horrible like it‚Äôs spoiled. I decided to try some on one half of my face anyway and within a few minutes my whole face started to swell on that side and now it feels hot and is red. I‚Äôve never had that reaction to anything before. I have been using this product for a week and I am already in love with it, it is very moisturizing and works well with acne! I love mixing the bronzi drops with it also! And I love how you pump it so I don‚Äôt have to stick my fingers in it and get the moisturizer dirty! I would definitely recommend!my my The product is great, the refill is awful!! DO NOT BUY THE REFILL!  It‚Äôs not worth the few dollars you save!  I was able to use the refill a couple times with no problem, now I can never get the refill to go into the push pump. So I wind up covering it with tinfoil and using it out of the container.  I‚Äôve tried it with multiple push pumps, and no luck. I really like this moisturizer, it‚Äôs hydrating and leaves my skin soft but it is really thick and I personally prefer thinner moisturizers I absolutely adore this moisturizer. I first discovered it in 2019 and instantly fell in love. I used it consistently for two years before getting curious and testing out other popular brands like Biossance, Tatcha, Youth to the People, Dieux, Dr. Dennis Gross, and Skinfix. After all that experimenting, I‚Äôve come full circle‚Äîthis is my holy grail. It deeply nourishes and repairs my skin barrier, keeps my combination skin hydrated, and never causes irritation (and I have very sensitive skin). A definite must-have! I love this moisturizer but the refills do not work.  I have purchased the refill twice now and both times it pops right in and then the pump doesn't work (no product comes out).  Then when I try to take it out the bottom part of the pump gets stuck in the refill and I can't get it loose. I have been using this product for the past few weeks and has lasted me about 1 months now and I love it and use it everyday but it's very thick. I absolutely love this product! Is fragrance free and alcohol free and perfect for my very sensitive skin, it doesn‚Äôt leave a greasy feeling. It‚Äôs great for the summer. This is an amazing product, it is just VERY thick. You have to put a few fingers fulls of product to get it to blend in without also rubbing around nothing on your skin. For $26CA it is pretty small. I like this product but for the price I would probably not buy it again. Drunk elephant products have always been a favorite! This one is very moisturizing and luxurious feeling, clean and ‚Äúunscented‚Äù but sometimes has an unpleasant scent like dirty towels. But better than fake fragrances!!! My favorite thing about DE is their packaging, product stays clean and sanitary without having to open caps to environment or stick your fingers inside. Easy to stack in vanity. I love drunk elephant. I use this when I need extra hydration! I am in love with this moisturizer! It is well worth the money if you have issues like eczema or dry skin. It moisturizes without leaving my skin oily. A must have for dry or combination skin. Was okay, my skin never felt fully moisturized after using. I have skin barrier issues and was in the market for something that would help with barrier repair. This is not that product. My skin was still flaky and because of the barrier issue, it actually stung to put this on. And I used this for a month (not ideal with the stinging but I was desperate). I just thought that with it supposed to ‚Äúreinforce skin barrier‚Äù and ‚Äúsoothe + replenish skin‚Äù that it would help but it did not. I definitely would not buy again but it might be good for someone else‚Äôs skin type. I would love to give this product five stars I really would. but it's a little too expensive a little too out of my price range. I still bought it to try it out and it's really good and moisturizing. but it kind of broke the bank a little. still recommend but still expensive! Very nice texture and packaging, but it smells like Play-Doh i have dry skin, and while this product is very moisturizing, it doesn't absorb well‚Äîeven after exfoliating beforehand. It‚Äôs a great product, but it is very expensive and it also is only filled up one or 2 inches before you get the refill but it is such a great product otherwise Ôøº The ingredients in this product are good, but I feel like the moisturizer just sat on top of my skin instead of melting into my face. Didn‚Äôt experience a deep hydration. The smell is not that bad! wanted to try this for so long but was pretty disappointed w the product. not sure if i just grabbed a bad one (just my luck), but it doesn‚Äôt feel very moisturizing and the smell sort of reminded me of play dough. my skin‚Äôs more on the drier side so it felt like i was using a DRY moisturizer where it just had a hint of moisturization. everyone‚Äôs different but this just didnt work out for me:) Made my skin feel greasy and caused a breakout on my chin. I have combination skin and it‚Äôs been dry lately so I tried this and it just didn‚Äôt work. I did like the dispenser and that it‚Äôs refillable, but ultimately returned because it just didn‚Äôt work. Very thick, no scent. Perfect for those dry days. I didn't really have that much product in it also I broke me out a couple times and the smell of it is literally terrible. Super moisturizing but didn‚Äôt feel thick or heavy. Kept my skin barrier healthy while using actives. Perfect for Dry skin!!! Very expensive and the mini is the size of my lip balm!! I have very dry dehydrated skin, nothing seems to moisturize it well so I got this as a sample. Very greasy and it somehow doesn‚Äôt feel moisturizing enough. Super moisturizing! Great coverage that wears well all day.
Have been wearing this foundation for a couple of years now & works well for sensitive skin. This is hands down the best foundation for acne-prone skin. I have been using this for 15+ years and it does not make my acne worse due to the salicylic acid in the formula. Now that my acne season has hopefully passed, my skin continues to do well with this foundation. I prefer to wear this foundation as it keeps my skin tone even and my face oils in check. 
One downfall - purchasing through this company directly, they have terrible customer service reps. It takes 15+ minutes to get a simple question asked and with very little respect given. I love this product, but I may continue to purchase through other vendors who aren't so rude to their customers when they ask questions about the product Good coverage, lightweight and long lasting. One of my favorite products. I was shade wheat! I don't believe it till I go for shade test my self.it turned out perfect on my skin matte and bright .love it This is the best foundation for anybody who wants to not worry about having to reapply their foundation throughout the day. Last through a 12-13 hour shifts and the skin looks like a doll! I don't stick with products very often....always looking for something better. But this? I have used this makeup for so long I couldn't name it exactly...at least 20 years. And I likely will the next 20! Smooth application. Stayed all day with minimal oil. Would recommend and will buy again I have tried every foundation on the market and I am unable to find any foundation that beats Est√©e Lauder Double Wear. Anyone I recommend this product to tells me they have found their holy grail of foundations. It lasts all day. It covers redness and blemishes flawlessly. It doesn't settle in my wrinkles or gives that cakey look. Please Est√©e Lauder, don't ever discontinue this product! I wanted to write my review on the foundation as many times that I used it i got nothing but compliments I am 57 years young and half these women think that I'm lying ‚ù§Ô∏èüôÇüôÇ i love the way it feels on my face it's not cakey it goes on really smooth and I would not change thank you Estee Lauder keep doing what your doing Overall good product. I've been using it for a couple years. I have very oily skin and this is the best foundation I've found to not make me look shiny. Not 100% staying on all day, but I think it's more because of my skin than the product. I love the way the foundation feels on the skin. It doesn't feel like you're wearing anything. My face doesn't feel dry and it also doesn't feel or look oily. This is worth the price. It stays long and perfect. I have always hated liquid foundation and felt like my skin can't breathe. Finally, I my mid 50s with my skin needing some extra help I tried this - I used the selfie tool to select a shade which worked well.  I applied it and stared at myself, feeling like those ads that I always assume were photoshopped. My skin looked even! And smooth! And I couldn't feel it on.  I kept checking throughout the day - it still looked smooth and even all day long even though I felt like I wasn't wearing anything.  Definitely a convert. Great foundation! Stays on place for the whole day long. Good for everyday and events, but it goes better with dry-texture products. It didn't affect the quality of my skin for 4 years. Also, you need a little of the product for good coverage of the whole face and neck. My last bottle lasted for a little more than 2 years. I don't need to look any further for my perfect foundation.  I am 56, combination skin, foundations break apart on my T zone and are prone to looking cakey.  Not this one.  I apply it with a very light touch, but it still gives excellent coverage, doesn't break down, and lasts all day.  The color match I got was perfect and the foundation looks beautiful.  Definitely worth the cost. I have struggled to find a foundation that doesn't settle in my pores or look cakey at the end of the day. This foundation stays in place all day and looks just as good at 5pm as it does at 8am. I love this foundation! It's the best foundation I've been using the double wear foundation since 2019. I love that its very long lasting, has very good coverage and doesn't smudge on clothes. do love this makeup, and I do continue to purchase it in the color Ratten. Rattan is a good light-medium skin, neutral color . Although I appreciate Est√©e  Lauder very much over the years, when I ordered it online October  9th, it still hasn't arrived. I had to call for them to "push it through" as it was sitting in the warehouse for over a week with no shipping details. Now it's suddenly says it's shipped, and will be arriving October 29th. That is very late and Iam overall not happy. I and ran out, and this isn't good. It shouldn't take 20 days to get, with no weather delays whatsoever. I also live above Atlanta, and you would think it would ship faster. I highly recommend purchasing at Ulta, Dillards , Belks, or somewhere else, because Est√©e Lauder online  is way too slow when ordering online. There is no excuse for shipping to take this long. I would like to get my shipping fee reimbursed. I can confidently say that Est√©e Lauder's Double Wear Stay-in-Place Foundation in 6W1 Nutmeg is my all-time favorite. The shade is a perfect match for my skin tone, seamlessly blending in without any noticeable lines.

What I love most about this foundation is its versatility. I can apply a thin layer for a medium coverage look, perfect for everyday wear, or build it up with multiple thin layers for a more full coverage finish when needed. It glides on smoothly and doesn't feel heavy or cakey, which is a huge plus.

The real game-changer is its longevity. I can wear it throughout the entire day, and it still looks fresh and flawless by the time I take it off. Whether I'm at work, running errands, or out in the evening, it holds up beautifully.

Overall, this foundation offers excellent coverage, a perfect shade match, and incredible staying power. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a reliable high quality foundation! I have been using EL foundation Fresh Air for 30+ years.  they stopped making it! so after a Chat on line I tried Futurist Anti aging. It was okay but I thought the color was too light so when I ran out I tried to purchase a deeper shade and they don't make that anymore.  So I bought Double Wear.  OMG!!  It the WORST product I have ever used.  Blotchy, flaking, lack of coverage, I look like a ghost!!.  Just awful.  Any recommendations on another product?  I thought I would go back to Futurist but no more anti-aging line.  Is the regular foundation for Futurist the same thing?  First time in all these years that I am not a happy camper with your foundations.  Bring back fresh air!! This is the best full coverage foundation..in love with this!!! Goes well for combination skin!! This is seriously so amazing foundation..in love with this ü§© It's five stars. I was just using cheap bronzer before but my face needed a change. Also, you can take an other before you purchase to help decide which color is best for you, it was very accurate. Very impressed with this foundation. It literally stay all day. Great coverage with a natural look and feel. I like this foundation, it's not cakey and it doesn't come off easily. I cannot say enough how much i love this foundation. This has worked so well for my skin! Great foundation for 40+ baddies! My go to make up for life! Best make up for a great coverage I highly recommend one of my favorite products and the only foundation I will Use! i never leave reviews but this deserves one. i have been using this for yearssss & it is by far the BEST foundation i have ever used. coverage is 10/10, no transferring, LONG lasting, blends with other products well & just looks flawless all day long. oh and, it lasts a very long time too! i never leave reviews but this deserves one. i have been using this for yearssss & it is by far the BEST foundation i have ever used. coverage is 10/10, no transferring, LONG lasting, blends with other products well & just looks flawless all day long. oh and, it lasts a very long time too! This foundation is light and is full coverage. It blends well with my skin tone. Good buy, good product! I have used Estee Lauder Double Wear Foundation for many years and there was a noticeable difference with this the first time I used this bottle.  The coverage was not as good and it made my eyes water.  I'm hoping this was a processing issue and I can swap for a new bottle that works. User error convinced me this was the worse foundation I've ever tried until I did some research. 
Read a review that said that if you hate this foundation you're either applying too much or not applying correctly. 
!!!That was a game changer. 

IMPORTANT- Turns out you only need a small amount and to work in small sections because it drys fast
Apply the leftover product from the sponge to your nose and forehead and chin. A thin layer here is key. 

*Lastly I ditched the primer! This stuff is full coverage and builable/ blurring enough to not necessitate Any added layers I have oily, acne scarred skin and this was the only foundation that provided full coverage, lasted for hrs without leaving my skin oily and gave me that matte finish. It kinda sucked all the oil when I applied this foundation. I loved it. I've been using it for years ! Something changed in the formula because I recently purchased a new bottle and it doesn't cover the scars. Please bring back the OLD one. Great coverage and consistency, easy to use .
Great color option ,looks very natural. I've been using this foundation for years and i refuse to use any other foundation , my absolute favorite ! I moisturized and put primer on my face before applying, after putting the foundation on, there was like white spots and didn't blend into my skin. I'm highly disappointed after spending $50 on a foundation that I can't even use, my $12 foundation does a better job than this. I thought spending more on a foundation, I would get better results but I experienced the opposite. The employees are very nice and always helpful . The best product ever!!! Must Buy This is my first time ever using this foundation and I'm loving it! The color match is flawless which is so hard to do with my olive skin. I have gotten so many compliments on how smooth my skin looks since using it too. I was told it would cover dark spots; it did not. Expensive disappointment!! For the longest time, as a woman with a deeper complexion, it's been so hard to find a foundation shade that truly matches my skin tone‚Äîlet alone my undertone. Finding a perfect match where I don't have to mix two different shades has always been a struggle. This brand, however, offers such an impressive shade range that I finally found my perfect match! I was influenced to buy this, but I hate it with a deep passion. it smells like glue, applies thick and dry, becomes hard incredibly fast. does not work well under moisturizer, facial oil, or sunscreen. does not work with facial creams or cream products. is extremely difficult to work with. it provides full coverage and does not transfer, yet does not move with the skin. dries with a powdery, cemented, scaley finish that I find very unappealing. the worst foundation I ever ever tried. normal skin texture and live in the north, for reference. may work for people with thick, oily dermis. This foundation matched my skin, easy to blend & felt so lightweight to the touch. I didnt have to reapply. Spent all day outside in the Texas heat & it didn't melt off Excellent coverage I used this product long ago. That's why I bought it. Now unfortunately it is very drying. I won't ever buy again. I have a very oily face and after reading so many reviews of different products this has got to be one of my Favorite foundations that actually stays perfect to my skin and does not crack nor does it look oily and I love it!! It works amazing for me! This is my everyday foundation!! Very light weight, very natural!!! The best foundation that i ever use I really wanted to love this foundation. It has great coverage and is very long lasting but my face feels so dry when I use this. It was to  to dry and and didn't like  it   Associate was in  rush  I ask her help me find a right shade for my skin tone but she was  not helpful   What a waist of money This covers well, blends into my skin tone perfectly and lasts all day. I bet a little dewey feel from it, but I apply a little bit of translucent powder just to set it. I wear it weekly. The best coverage there is, especially for summers in the South. When on sale at Ulta, I always stock up! FINALLY, I FOUND IT.  After many trial and errors and money, I found the product that works best for my complexion. And I should add that it was with great help from the cosmetic sales lady. I've been using this foundation for almost 20 years. It has gone through at least 3 noticeable formula changes in that time. It started out as a thick, opaque, full coverage, everything-proof foundation and is now a mediocre, medium-at-best coverage, normal liquid foundation. The last two bottles I bought have oxidized in the bottle within 6-8 months, even when used with a pump immediately upon opening (so it is not exposed by the bottle opening) and being kept in a drawer. That alone will keep me from buying another. I also get oily after a few hours, even with proper prep and set. It oxidizes on my face over the course of the day and wipes off in places easily, so it looks patchy at various times as well. This just isn't the best on the market anymore and the price point is absurd for the lesser quality. I appreciate that it never causes issues for my acne prone skin and that it doesn't have a scent. The shades run very peachy and there is not a true olive shade (once it dries down and/or changes color over the day). There used to be 2 great olive shades I could wear before the last reformulation. I haven't found a proper shade since, and resorted to using a color corrector bc I thought I liked the formula. No more. I have never found a better shade match and felt so happy the day I found my shade. I love the coverage and always end up using too much because it doesn't have a pump. I have seen pumps for this on the internet and must remember to get one. You have to shake this formula to get the best out of it. It does last a really long time and it doesn't break apart. I think it's supposed to be a medium coverage and you are supposed to see your skin/freckels underneath it. I was trying to cover redness and used too much of this.
I think I used too much powder and too much foundation because I stopped using this after a few bad days with my makeup looking to heavy. I liked it better when I really prepped my skin with moisturizer and primer. If you have dryness and texture problems they can get magnified by the dry down of this formula. It's a super long lasting formula and is supposed to dry down, so it accomplishes that well. I didn't have a dewy setting spray at the time so I used what I had but I think it looks better after it's been worn for two hours or so. I think you need to be better than a beginner to use this. It needs the right supporting products to go with it. A setting spray that softens it, something like a primer to save the texture/pores you see, the right powder, and the nearly 60 shades to choose from makes it kind of tricky to use.
I tried it out because I got it on sale but I think I prefer others over this. I'm just getting back into makeup and need something a little more forgiving . This foundation is not full coverage BUT it is great for daily use. My favorite thing is that it does not transfer. I go to the gym and when I dab my face there is little to no transfer on my towels. It is also slightly mattifying. Best match to my skin and color will definitely buy again I'm in my early 30s and have a tendency to have really oily skin. It is a gift when it comes to aging but it's a curse when it comes to make up. I was using Fenty Matte foundation for years and suddenly it just kept separating and not working for me. I did some research on Reddit for oily skin and I saw people promote this product. It is amazing. I have no separation going on whatsoever and it's great coverage and easily blend with other cream makeup before it dries down. It feels like it might be a little drying, but at least I can layer on the moisturizer and not feel like I'm going to end up oily in an hour. I really recommend this to anybody that struggles with oily skin!! Worth the money! I thought I would love it but I hate it. Long wear, yeah I guess sure??? Although it just feels so dry and dull on my skin. I tried prepping my skin differently multiple times and still disappointed. I really like the coverage,  but as a 66 year old women this is giving me breakouts  of acne all over my face. I went to the Dr. and he comfered it, but over all the  it covered well and last all day. I have purchased this foundation for several years.  I love how it is a matte finish, easy to apply even with my fingers and the coverage is great!  I will continue to purchase and hope Ulta continues to stock this great 
foundation and the variety. I have been using this foundation for a couple of years now and I love this foundation! I have acne and it doesn't leave my skin feeling grease. I love the coverage it gives! It is in the spender side but totally worth it. I'm so disappointed in EL! I've worn the same Double Wear foundation for 10+ years. It went on so well and held up all day in any condition. Upon purchasing a new bottle, it didn't apply well. The foundation would instantly look cakey in areas, settling in pores and lines, and certainly did last all day. Worst of all, the new formula gives me a terrible eye irritation. I know several other long time users experiencing similar issues. Really disappointed in the new formula and left to find a new foundation after all of these years!!! I love this foundation - it gives natural looking great coverage and does not rub off.  When they say stay in place they mean it! Nothing like giving a hug and leaving your face all over someones shirt!  Won't happen with this product. I've worn this makeup for several years and have always paid retail price. It was a special delight to finally buy it from Ulta for a bargain.  I would recommend this makeup for comfort and coverage.  Thanks Ulta! A little goes a long way. It blends so well with my skin tone that it looks like I don't have any makeup on. Not a heavy formula. I hope this formula never changes. I was pleased with the results. This is the perfect foundation for me. It is smooth, has great coverage and lasts all day. Whenever i wear this foundation and a couple of other products, people want to know the make up i am wearing.  Sooo, this foundation presents well The coverage is great & feels so light. This goes on smoothly and has a beautiful finish. It lasts a long time too. Hands down the best foundation I tried this for the first time recently because it was on sale and out of frustration with my former product.  I cannot believe I have been missing out on this all these years!  It is perfect for my middle-aged but oily skin.  As previous reviews suggested, I applied with a slightly damp sponge.  The effect is very natural.  It is not a pasty matte finish, it literally just looks like my own skin, but better.  Does not accentuate pores and is the longest-lasting of all the prestige brands that I have tried.  I wouldn't go so far to say that it is "oil-controlling", but am very impressed with it's staying power, even after blotting.  I love it! I always re purchase this foundation. It's so good at lasting all day. Great coverage too. My new favorite ‚ù§Ô∏è I've been using Estee Lauder since my mid 40's.  Beautiful product.  As I aged, of course I had to change the color foundation.  But once you get your moisturizer and primer on.... it's flawless.  LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!
, I've tried them all‚Ä¶and this, by far, is the best! This is the best lasting liquid foundation out there! It is buildable and full coverage, if desired. It lasts all day.   I was sweating at a football game for hours.  Standing in line for the bathroom, the woman behind me said,"How in the world is your make up still perfect?" Thank you, Est√©e Lauder! Thank you, Ulta, for putting it on sale. used it for years As I get older it really hides the wrinkles Wouldn"t use anything else This is my favorite foundation and the simple fact that you had it at the price that you did was so worth it. It's not too heavy, but it foes cover well. I definitely would recommend it. If you are oily this is a perfect foundation! It lasts all day and keeps you matte and is full coverage. Downside is it has no pump, so unfortunately i returned it due to it being a hassle 
Other than that, its good I used to wear this foundation for a while up until last summer when I decided it was time for a change. I purchased it during the sale. It has drastically changed. It went on like I was painting my face with oil & remained that way all day I have been using Double Wear for many years. It gives great coverage and looks flawless. I get many compliments on my beautiful skin. What more could one hope for! The formula is perfect, not too thick or thin. Lasts all day. Wore it when my daughter got married and the coverage was there all day, indoors and out! I do have pretty dark acne scars and I do color correct first, this foundation I will most likely wear for my wedding, but It is not the most full coverage. You will need to still slightly color correct and use concealer under it. But the skin like finish and "good" coverage it gives makes up. I have drug store foundations that are more full coverage but doesn't give the finish this one does. I've worn this foundation off and on for many years.  It is thick, full coverage, but I have a lot of lines on my face so it can settle in those.  I use a drop of my face oil to give it a little glow and an easier spread and that has worked well for me.  My shade is 2C4 Ivory Rose, which is not available in stores and hard to find online.  I was able to purchase this during the 21 Days of Beauty and for the first time in a few years, Ulta had it in stock.  I placed my order before 6 am to ensure that I got my shade.  (In past years, I tried ordering later in the day and it was unavailable by then.)  If you need full coverage foundation, I recommend this.  One bottle lasts me about 9 months.  I recommend the pump (not included) for the correct amount.  You only need 1! I love this product. In the summer, I sweated so much because of hot flashes. You would never know because this light but double-wear foundation stayed on all day, my whole workshift. The days that I went somewhere after work until 11 pm my makeup still looked good.  I wear the color Cashew, it's like a medium light hint that helps balance my yellow undertones. The quality of the product is 100% recommended I have been using Est√©e Lauder for years and still
Love it. My favorite foundation! This was the first time trying this foundation.  I'm 57, so a moisturizing foundation is what I'm looking for.  This line has a ton of color choice and you will definitely find a match.  I found it to be a bit drying and by the end of day it started looking cakey and dry on my skin.  Besides that, a quality product. I love this brand Perfect for covering imperfections. Stays and last the whole day. This is truly the only foundation that stays on all day and night. Yes its pricey but worth every penny of it! I would recommend this to anyone, great foundation I love itüòçüòç One of the best foundation It has beautiful coverage and everyone always tells me what gorgeous skin I have. My favorite! Might have to go one shade lighter I can't believe that I finally found my favorite foundation, after all these years!! This does NOT compare to any drug store dupes! Work in a restaurant, not only did the product go on so smooth with such coverage but it looked amazing after a 5 hour shift of running and hustling in a restaurant (including patio tables!) Shade match thanks to Ava at ulta in lincoln was spot on!!! For background, I've used Maybelline Fit Me for my fair, combination skin (minimal acne and some fine lines but overall I'm very careful with my skin) for over 5 years. But, I wanted to explore other options to see if a higher quality brand and formula might be worth it. I don't love Fit Me, but it's worked well enough. Decided to give this foundation a shot after lots of research and luckily got it on sale. But, it‚Ä¶was terrible. I followed the instructions, tried using it with my normal routine (after clean skin, exfoliation, sunscreen, lotion, base layer), then tried suggestions found online. Nothing worked‚ÄîI kept looking cakey and so dry. The color was OK but slightly orange undertones left me uneasy wearing it on top of the application issues. I would honestly return the product if I hadn't throw the box away. I've never ran into this much of an issue with foundation before! This is my go to and works wonders. something definitely changed with this formula and I'm so disappointed. I have an old bottle from a few years back that I wanted to replace, but the difference in performance is wild. It used to be amazing for oil control and now it breaks up so easily, something it never did before. doublewear is the only foundation I used until now and I wanted to use it forever! I can't use any other foundation this is the goat foundation frfrrrr The best all day coverage without looking cakey. I'm using this for product for more then 25 years. Best ever  no lines on my face perfect üëå shade  .. I always look like I'm not having makeup on my face .. I can swim with my makeup ..  Best foundation  waterproof  I will keep buying more  for my friends This is a versatile coverage product, would be perfect for a long lasting light to medium coverage or can be layered to build coverage. It has a very thin consistency making it difficult to cover scaring and acne marks but lasts & is rather dewy. Love this foundation! One of the only ones that holds up to my super oily skin. It doesn't bother me at all that the bottle doesn't have a pump. It is much better without. I don't waste any product! Amazing foundation. Perfect color. Lasts all day. Didn't oxidize much. Great coverage, can be used any season, all skin types I've been using this foundation for years, and haven't found anything I like better. I've tried 10+ other high-end foundations, and always come back to this one. It stays on all day without smudging, doesn't transfer, covers blemishes without looking cakey, and doesn't settle into fine lines. I use one pump for more of an everyday look, but can layer if I want more of a "full glam". One bottle also lasts me for months. Highly recommend! I absolutely love this foundation. It's more expensive than the one I used before but definitely worth it. Great coverage. I compared the new foundation I bought to the old one ai had. The new foundation I got is changed. Not the same texture not the same shade. I'm 38 and I tried 3 different foundations and this was the absolute best for my age highly recommend I love this foundation, covers so good and works great with my oily skin! I really like this foundation.It covers very well.It lasts all day, so it is well worth the price Love the shade.

product_name: Est√©e Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Global Anti-Aging Cream
merged_reviews:
This doesn‚Äôt absorb and makes me look really greasy. Not sure why the positive reviews. The most incredible moisturizer I‚Äôve ever used! Very moisturizing and after using for only a short time, I‚Äôve noticed a huge difference in how my face and neck feel and look! It‚Äôs worth every dime. I‚Äôve been using the Est√©e Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme SPF 25 for a while now, and it truly feels like a little luxury in my skincare routine. The texture is rich and silky, yet it absorbs quickly without leaving my skin greasy. Right after applying, my face feels smooth, hydrated, and has a healthy glow that lasts throughout the day. I also love that it has SPF 25, so I can use it as my daytime moisturizer and know I‚Äôm getting extra protection. Over time I noticed my skin looking a bit firmer and more even, especially around the jawline and smile lines. It also works really well under makeup, almost like a primer, keeping my foundation fresh without making it cakey. The only thing to note is the fragrance ‚Äì it‚Äôs noticeable, though I personally find it pleasant.
I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. Amazing!! It‚Äôs super hydrating it leaves my skin feeling silky smooth and not tacky or oily like some other skin products I would recommend highly. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. As a moisturizer it's fantastic, especially for dry skin types. Everything else is lies and falsehood!
Also another drawback, be aware that it will darken more towards orangish hue on the face and neckor whereever else it is put on the skin!  If that's not what you like, then choose wisly I've been using a lot of products for acne prone skin that have been very drying to the skin and this moisturizer is a god send!  Very hydrating and non-greasy!  I just wish the scent wasn't so overpowering! I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes This moisturizer is lightweight, non-greasy, and absorbs quickly, leaving my skin soft, smooth, and hydrated all day. It's perfect for daily use and works well even on sensitive skin. The formula feels gentle and refreshing, with no heavy residue. A great addition to any skincare routine! I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. I didn‚Äôt get the hype for this one. I didn‚Äôt see anything special changes to my skin and I didn‚Äôt notice it being ultra hydrating or anything like that. The added spf was nice but spf 30 would have been better. I don‚Äôt think it is worth the high price tag. For reference I have dry skin. 

I received this product for free from Topbox marketing for testing and review purposes. It was moisturizing, but that‚Äôs about it. I am really disappointed and did not see any changes in my skin. For the price tag I expected something special. I even think the added spf broke me out a bit (although I have extremely sensitive skin) I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. This cream feels like a silky hug for my skin. The texture is rich without being heavy, and it sinks in beautifully without leaving a greasy finish. I noticed my skin felt plumper, more hydrated, and had that fresh, healthy glow by the next morning. The scent is light and elegant‚Äîjust enough to make it feel luxurious. A little goes a long way, so even though it‚Äôs on the pricier side, it lasts. Perfect for anyone who wants to indulge in a moisturizer that actually delivers.

I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. Loving this moisturizer for summer!
It goes on smoothly and feels very moisturizing on the skin. I love how it combines hydration with sun protection. After applying, my skin feels soft, hydrated and plum throughout the day. I‚Äôm beyond impressed with this moisturizer! I received this product for free from TopBox Circle for testing and review purposes. I've been using the Est√©e Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Cr√®me for a few weeks now, and I'm genuinely impressed. The texture is rich yet lightweight, absorbing quickly without leaving a greasy residue. It leaves my skin feeling deeply moisturized, smooth, and noticeably firmer. There's a subtle, luxurious scent that adds to the overall experience without being overpowering.

What stands out the most is how radiant and plump my skin looks after consistent use. It feels like my skin has more bounce and elasticity, and the fine lines around my eyes and mouth appear softer. It also works well under makeup, providing a smooth base without pilling.

I have also noticed major improvement to my skin since I started using this. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. Great product, it has very thick texture so if you have oily skin I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it. But for dry skin it‚Äôs amazing, very moisturizing and has spf which is always a plus.
I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. I love this cream!!! This cream is very hydrating, light weight and it genuinely feels amazing on the skin. The fact that it also has sunscreen included makes it the perfect cream for everyday purposes. I have also noticed major improvement to my skin since I started using this. product_name: Fenty Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Foundation
merged_reviews:
best foundation in the market, love it!! best for oily skin this was my first foundation that i‚Äôve ever had, and after using it for a long time (i went through a period of base makeup blindness üíÄ), it was just okay, from what i remember. even though it is a matte foundation, i remember it drying down very cakey, it‚Äôs high-coverage so you don‚Äôt need a lot, but then again, even with a normal amount i found it to be very cakey. it‚Äôs not very layerable, and after a while it defines your forehead lines and other wrinkle lines. it starts to pill around oily areas, especially around my t-zone where my glasses are as well. it also oxidizes A LOT, and it just made me look orange once it fully settled into my skin, despite me getting shade matched. This oxidizes so orange! When I first applied it, it looked like a great match. After about 20 minutes it looked so orange and defined every fine line on my face. Returned. I bought the wrong color so that‚Äôs my fault! However this foundation is beautiful! Love how it blurs and stays matte during the day on my oily skin! I have mixed experiences with this. One day it‚Äôs fine, the next it‚Äôs not. Same routine everytime. I am fair skinned and when testing at the store it was right. I used it on my face and it might as well have been unrubbed in sunscreen. For the price I am so disappointed separates and cakey. worst foundation ever i wanted to like it so bad because its fenty but it doesnt live up to any of her other products Best foundation which i ever tried best of all foundations Good coverage but left my skin very dry despite having combo skin. It made my makeup look cakey. Did not break me out tho and it lasted the whole day. love it, one bottle lasts me 1-3 months ! it‚Äôs full coverage and covers up my bad acne I used to love this foundation so much. I bought it immediately on launch and it was the only product that lasted on my oily skin throughout the day and had beautiful coverage but the last 2 bottles I bought I notice become very shiny and greasy after a short period of time and have less coverage. I‚Äôm disappointed because I loved this foundation so much and went through many bottles of it. If you are very oily I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it but if you are mildly or combo this would still probably be a good option. I have oily acne prone skin and have been using this foundations for years. This became my favourite foundation pretty quickly after trying and remained my top choice until my latest bottle. This foundation used to be much more mattifying and lasting 8-10+ hours, but with my latest bottle it no longer holds up nearly as well. I would call this a natural finish. The old formula did not require a powder in the deep winter, and this one absolutely does, and that's unheard of for me. This new formula requires powder basically always. I will be finishing what I have and will not repurchase as I want something more mattifying. Tried it for a few weeks and it was just too cakey/separated on my skin despite trying no primer, different primers, etc. Loved the scent of this foundation however I found that the formula was thin and had to add multiple layers to achieve full coverage.  It was hard to find a shade match.  Good foundation for the price and would be great for someone who doesn‚Äôt have many dark spots or blemishes to cover. I've recently switched to this foundation after 25+ years of wearing another brand. It's great coverage, matte finish and the shade match is dang near perfect. I bought two bottles at one time because I loved it so much. I‚Äôve repurchased this foundation several times, but recently noticed a change in the formula. While it‚Äôs marketed as suitable for oily skin, it no longer performs as expected on my combination skin. Even with proper skincare prep and setting powder, it leaves me looking oily throughout the day. It feels heavy on the skin, settles into my laugh lines, and transfers quite easily. Unfortunately, it now feels more like a product sitting on top of my skin rather than blending in naturally. Super spotty/splotchy. I even made sure to use a water base primer before. This is the perfect full coverage foundation. I need a foundation for a special occasion and this one worked out really well. It‚Äôs easy to use and blend. It does oxidize HOWEVER if you get the right shade that doesn‚Äôt become an issue. Undertones really matter wjth this one so be mindful of that when purchasing. This stuff riiight here-I friggin LOVE IT!!! I have been loyal to Est√©e Lauder foundation-was used at patents, catwalks, home, etc. This is MY generations foundation prototype. No other brand has come up with the PERFECT shade of foundation. FENTY gets fair black skin (even if you tan naturally from the sun, like me, there is a shade for you). I am so happy Isabella found my perfect shade. I truly can‚Äôt thank her enough. Ugly, cakey, flakey, drying, heavy, separates and transfers, sticky feeling, emphasizes skin texture and flaws. Hate it hate it hate it. Not worth a penny. Straight to the trash. I just love me some Fenty Beauty always used liquid and powder makeup My skin color is a bit uneven so it‚Äôs hard to know my color but with this foundation it made me look one color and didn‚Äôt look off putting I‚Äôd say this product does a great job of covering up underlying acne scars and blemishes but the consistency was a little too thick and clogging for my skin. It‚Äôs good as a longwear, heavy foundation but wouldn‚Äôt really be my go to for everyday wear Great makeup for mature skin . I am 51 years old Fenty for the win get you some . I love this brand . Makes me feel and look pretty Too orange ! Like all the shades oxidize so much it‚Äôs crazy Dries quickly, gets difficult to blend. Over all a nice finish is blended properly on a good base seriously so good for all skin types I would say and the worth the money . love all the shade ranges too and it's buildable Best foundation i‚Äôve ever used it blends right in ! I love how this foundation gives a natural glow without looking greasy. It feels super lightweight, lasts all day, and provides great coverage without feeling heavy. Perfect for everyday wear‚Äîdefinitely buying again! I‚Äôve been using this product for the past several months and it is by far my favorite foundation I‚Äôve ever used. It is a buildable foundation, and it always makes my skin look so amazing. I am especially happy with the range of shades, as I am very pale and often times brands don‚Äôt have a light enough shade for me. The oxidation is great and sets to my skin tone perfectly i think ill go for the next shade down for the summer I absolutely love the Fenty Pro Filt‚Äôr Soft Matte Foundation! The coverage is flawless, the finish is smooth and natural, and it truly lasts all day without feeling heavy. It blends beautifully and gives my skin that soft, airbrushed look. Hands down, one of the best foundations I‚Äôve ever used‚ÄîRihanna really did her thing with this one! I love THIS FOUNDATION SO MUCH its one of the best foundations you‚Äôll ever use I have oily and dry combination skin so this literally works if you either skin, so amazing and it‚Äôs honestly so good 10/10 and the  price is so good too like 40$ worth it!!!! Not super full coverage. It lays on nicely, but the coverage isn‚Äôt there. It‚Äôs better for those who may not have scaring or acne i gave a 2 star because I like how the product feels on my skin, BUT........It claims it mattifies but I still look like a greasy chicken wing. Tried the Fenty Beauty foundation today ‚Äî and yes, the hype is REAL üíÅüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüî• This shade was too light for me but it feels very nice on the skin. The coverage is very nice. I believe it‚Äôs medium coverage but it covers all my dark spots and blemishes pretty well. Doesn‚Äôt leave my skin feeling dry. I like it, wish I had it in my shade THE BEST!!! Use a brush to apply this.. i made the mistake of trying a blender and it became super blotchy throughout the day. I've always had a love/hate relationship with day creams that contain SPF. Although I completely understand the importance of SPF, I'm not sure if it's the scent, white cast or greasiness I associate with sunscreens but I'm pretty picky when it comes to moisturizers with added SPF. I've tried many and this R√©nergie H.P.N. 300-Peptide Anti-Aging Cream SPF 25 from Lanc√¥me is definitely one of the best. It's very hydrating without feeling too heavy. First...the smell: it's overwhelming and obnoxious. It smells like something from Avon circa 1954 that has gone bad in the back of great aunt Marge's vanity and was found last year after she died. This is a PRESTIGE brand; why does it smell like something the coroner would use too cover decomp?

Sometimes, makeup just needs to be makeup. As a sensitive skin, highly acne-prone girly, I am so frustrated by the trend lately where every. single. foundation. has to somehow be infused with hyaluronic acid, or some other on-trend ingredient.

Reliable formulas I've loved for years, some for more or less a decade, I now have to abandon because they reformulate, which leads to one or more of the following effects:

1) The makeup just sucks. It oxidizes, or comes out of the tube darker or some other tone than it used to, and generally doesn't match what it used to. 

2) It breaks you out. A makeup that used to be the HG for breakout-prone girlies is now part of the problem because they force "skincare" into the formula. So those of us who spent years hunting and came to rely on a foundation now have to abandon it and are shunned as loyal customers. 

3) It separates. More often than not, the "skincare" being blindly mixed into these foundations is not meant to mix with the types of formulas in the makeup. So you end up with a foundation that ends up separating on your face and looking disgusting, whereas the original formula used to last an entire day, .

I am so deeply disappointed and frustrated with the makeup industry lately. I can barely find a single cosmetic that doesn‚Äôt tout some ‚Äúskin saving‚Äù ingredient anymore, and all I want is a simple foundation and concealer. I‚Äôm not interested in paying more for makeup that doesn‚Äôt even work half as well as it used to.
